title: A *NO RGB* Gaming PC?!
tags: building a no rgb gaming pc
description: SPONSOR: Shop VIP-SCDKey Windows 10/11 OEM keys for $16 during their Black Friday sale by using code 'SKGS' to save 25%:   RGB is overrated! ...at least, that's how I've been feeling lately. It seems every gaming PC has RGB LEDs in it, and it made we want to build one without any RGB at all! How will it look? I think you'll be pleasantly surprised!  Enter for a chance to win one of two AMD RX 6750 XTs!    Consider supporting us on Patreon!    PC parts list: AMD Ryzen 7 7800X3D:  NZXT N7 B650E:  32GB Kingston Fury Beast DDR5:  EVGA 700W GD:  ASUs Strix RTX 2080:  1TB Corsair MP600 Pro XT NVMe:  Lian Li Lancool Mesh 205 C:  ID-Cooling FrostFlow X 240:    My studio gear on Amazon: Sony A7C (Primary):  Sony a6600 (Secondary):  Sony a6400 (Webcam):  2x Pixio PX277 Prime 165Hz IPS Monitors:  Neewer LED Lighting Kit:  Audio-Technica AT2035:  Yamaha MG10XU Mixer:  Neewer Microphone Arms:  Arrowzoom Sound-Damping Foam Panels:    Follow me on social media: TWITCH:  FACEBOOK:  TWITTER:  INSTAGRAM:    Join our public Discord server:    Channel music provided by Monstercat:   DISCLOSURES: All Genius links are tied to our Amazon Associate account, from which we earn a small sales commission. Links containing a 'bit.ly' reference forwarding to Newegg are tied to our Rakuten account, from which we earn a small sales commission. All sponsored links and comments will contain the word "SPONSOR" or "AD." Any additional revenue stream will be disclosed with similar verbiage.
